name: The Last Hope: Trump vs Mafia - North Korea
description: You are Trump, the President of all Countries. Shortly after being sworn in, you travel to Europe for a conference, but your airplane is shot-down by mafia members. The Mafia and terrorists from all ex-countries join forces against you. Now you have to fix this mess.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Dual Core e8500 3.2ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GT 230 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel i5 4460 3.2ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660/GTX 950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
